Properties

Use the properties components to show a list of features for a topic, for example: for a person. This component is mostly used to show information that was entered in a form.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-properties

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-properties

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-properties/src/scss/properties";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Properties

All data is visualized in one column and consists of labels followed by values.

Gegevens

Voornaam
Koen
Naam
Peeters
Geslacht
Man
      
  <div class="vl-properties">
    <h1 class="vl-properties__title">Gegevens</h1>
    <dl class="vl-properties__list">
        <dt class="vl-properties__label">Voornaam</dt>
        <dd class="vl-properties__data">Koen</dd>
        <dt class="vl-properties__label">Naam</dt>
        <dd class="vl-properties__data">Peeters</dd>
        <dt class="vl-properties__label">Geslacht</dt>
        <dd class="vl-properties__data">Man</dd></dl>
  </div>

Properties in two columns

All data is divided in two columns. Add the vl-properties__column--full class modifier to display the columns over the full width of the container.

Gegevens

Voornaam
Koen
Naam
Peeters
Geslacht
Man
Telefoonnummer
000/00.00.00
Gsm-nummer
000/00.00.00
E-mailadres
koen.peeters@outlook.be
Nationaliteit
Belg
Burgerlijke staat
Getrouwd
Adres
Havenlaan 88
1000 Brussel
      
  <div class="vl-properties">
    <h1 class="vl-properties__title">Gegevens</h1>
      <div class="vl-properties__column">
        <dl class="vl-properties__list">
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Voornaam</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">Koen</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Naam</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">Peeters</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Geslacht</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">Man</dd>
        </dl>
      </div>
      <div class="vl-properties__column">
        <dl class="vl-properties__list">
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Telefoonnummer</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">000/00.00.00</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Gsm-nummer</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">000/00.00.00</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">E-mailadres</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">koen.peeters@outlook.be</dd>
        </dl>
      </div>
      <div class="vl-properties__column vl-properties__column--full">
        <dl class="vl-properties__list">
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Nationaliteit</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">Belg</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Burgerlijke staat</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data">Getrouwd</dd>
            <dt class="vl-properties__label">Adres</dt>
            <dd class="vl-properties__data"><div>Havenlaan 88</div><div>1000 Brussel</div></dd>
        </dl>
      </div></div>
